what: TiddlyWiki Field and Title Conventions Utilities
title: TiddlyWiki Field and Title Conventions Utilities
text: ‘TWConventions’ provides utilities encoding enforcing conventions semantic meaning TiddlyWiki tiddler titles, fields, tags. includes functions handle canonical names, alternative names (aka), project-specific inclusion rules, structured assumptions TiddlyWiki content. package allows R scripts projects reliably interpret TiddlyWiki data according standardized conventions without depending transport workflow mechanisms.
